[[File:Arthropod Mobs.png|thumb|Every arthropod in ''[[Minecraft]]''.]]
'''Arthropod''' is an in-game classification covering all invertebrate, bug-like [[mobs]].

== Properties ==
All arthropods share the two following properties.
* Arthropods take extra damage and receive [[Slowness]] IV when hit with a weapon [[Enchanting|enchanted]] with [[Bane of Arthropods]]. 
*{{IN|java}}, all of these mobs are part of the {{cd|#arthropod}} [[entity tag]]. {{IN|bedrock}}, all of these mobs are part of the {{cd|arthropod}} [[family]].

== List of mobs ==
* {{EntityLink|Bee}}
* {{EntityLink|Cave Spider}}
* {{EntityLink|Endermite}}
* {{EntityLink|Silverfish}}
* {{EntityLink|Spider}}
